name: PvZ Clone (Void dancer)
description:
Controls:  Left mouse click for most interactions, right click to cancel plant selection.
Game made with Pixel game maker mv.

There is no win or loss condition as of now, and no choose your seeds.
i don't intend on making a full game this is just an ADHD project lol.

Known Issues:
-Lag, its recommended that you play with no other task running in the background.
